problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别与AB、AC相交于点D、E,若AD=4,DB=2,则AE:EC的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AD = N_0, DB = N_1, then the value of AE : EC is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例定理,有的同学因为没有找准对应关系,从而导致错选其他答案．
